body:
Hi,
I am nintendoboy11. Yes, I come from Overcast but I just want to see what Avicus is all about. So yeah, see you ingame o/

Welcome to Avicus! If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact any of the staff members, as we'll be more than happy to help. 

Enjoy your stay! :3

replies.body: Just to let you know I am a big Nintendo Fanboy, so if you want to talk about anything Nintendo feel free to contact me on Skype: (live:rpreator0520). Just make sure you read the rules (avicus.net/rules) and Have a fun time!

replies.body:
Hey there :)
Welcome to Avicus. 
If you need any help contact a staff member or any of the community members, we don't bite :D (well... sometimes we get hungry xD) 
Be sure to follow the rules at www.avicus.net/rules.
And the most important thing, be sure to enjoy your stay!! :D
